Class AbstractVoiceActivityDetector

All Implemented Interfaces:
DataProcessor, Configurable
Direct Known Subclasses:
SpeechClassifier
public abstract class AbstractVoiceActivityDetector
extends BaseDataProcessor

An abstract analyzer that signals about presense of speech in last processing frame. This information is used in noise filtering components to estimate noise spectrum for example.
